address: 120 N. LaSalle Street, Suite 2000, Chicago, Illinois 60602
subHeading: A law firm focused on solving problems
valueProp:
Crotty & Schiltz, LLC is a law firm focused on solving problems. They counsel businesses and executives on achieving their goals. Their attorneys have experience in business counseling, transactions, executive compensation, employment disputes, insurance, litigation, and restructuring & insolvency. They prioritize counseling over obstructing and aim to put their experience to work for their clients.

Crotty & Schiltz, LLC is a law firm dedicated to providing effective solutions for businesses and executives. With a focus on counseling rather than obstructing, their experienced attorneys offer guidance in various practice areas, including corporate law, employment law, insurance, litigation, and restructuring & insolvency. The firm is known for its expertise in bet-the-business cases, executive compensation, commercial transactions, and high-stakes litigation.
